plot: Cinderella must arrive home in her new coach by midnight, or else she will lose her coach, her new dress, and the prince.
title: A Ride for Cinderella
plot_es: Cinderella must arrive home in her new coach by midnight, or else she will lose her coach, her new dress, and the prince.
plot_en: Cinderella must arrive home in her new coach by midnight, or else she will lose her coach, her new dress, and the prince.
